Get indicator metadata as a data frame

get_metadata.Rd

Get indicator metadata as a data frame

get_metadata()

Value

Metadata about indicators as a list

Examples

get_metadata()

#>    data_type  plot_type               indicator     value_column
#> 1     survey choropleth              prevalence         estimate
#> 2     survey choropleth            art_coverage         estimate
#> 3  programme choropleth             art_current      art_current
#> 4     survey choropleth         recent_infected         estimate
#> 5     survey choropleth viral_suppression_plhiv         estimate
